Name: Daggan
About the game: Why Should You Survive Alone Against Villains ? Create allies the sexy way to help you build your town and save the world. But beware, for nights are dark and ancient evils will come for you. Features Have sex with your allies to create units Gather resources to create buildings Use the Skilltree to choose your strategy Fight each night against waves of enemies Explore a procedural map & underground dungeons Original soundtrack Random NPCs on the map to have sex and get rewards Collect books to discover the lore and unlock content Sexy statues to get passive skills
